document.full_text: french police were searching friday for a man they suspect of murdering his wife and four children and burying them in the garden in the western city of nantes, along with the family's two pet labradors.
document.title: french police hunt man over murder of family, dogs
lines_and_colors: french police were searching friday for a man they suspect of murdering his wife and four children and burying them in the garden in the western city of nantes, along with the family's two pet labradors.
